Subject: [Action Advised] Protect your applications and enhance your security

From: Google Developers <GoogleDevelopers-noreply@google.com>
To: hello@showup.courses
Date: Fri, 30 May 2025 23:43:58 -0700

Subject: [Action Advised] Protect your applications and enhance your security

OAuth clients inactive for 6 months will be automatically deleted starting June 2025. Hello Google Auth Platform Developer, We're writing to inform you about an upcoming change that may affect your

Subject: "hey Bryce check out Virtual Assistant for Mariska van Helsdingen Mon 26 May, 07:17 (3 days ago) to me  Good morning Bryce  I hope you are doing well and have fully recovered.    I just wanted to follow up on my last email and find out if you have anything else you would like me to do for you.   Hope you have a good day.  Kind regards Mariska
